message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $150.  I think it's a great deal for something of this quality.
I'm interested in the product, but $150 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $80.
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $80 is too low, I'm willing to come down a bit to $130.  I believe this product is worth the value it provides.
I'm still a bit hesitant, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about $110?
